refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: b = remez1 (n, f, a) b = remez1 (n, f, a, w) b = remez1 (n, f, a, w, ftype) b = remez1 (n, f, a, w, ftype, griddensity)

listitem.para: gives the number of taps in the returned filter
gives frequency at the band edges [b1 e1 b2 e2 b3 e3 …]
gives amplitude at the band edges [a(b1) a(e1) a(b2) a(e2) …]
gives weighting applied to each band
determines how accurately the filter will be constructed. The minimum value is 16, but higher numbers are slower to compute.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Frequency is in the range (0, 1), with 1 being the Nyquist frequency.
